itemLabel: Colin Marshall, Baron Marshall of Knightsbridge

wikipedia_page.main: Colin Marsh Marshall, Baron Marshall of Knightsbridge (16 November 1933 – 5 July 2012) was a British businessman and member of the House of Lords.
